featured.text: This group of islands off the coast of Ecuador has recently contracted Argentine Corporación America to manage the redevelopment of the airport on the island of Baltra.
All of them successfully 28 the destruction of postwar redevelopment and remained unchanged.

definition.zh_def: 重新開發，指對某一地區或建築進行改建或改造，以改善其功能或外觀。
definition.en_def: The process of developing an area or building again, often to improve its functionality or appearance.
definition.example: The city plans to invest in the redevelopment of the old industrial site into a vibrant community space.
